Class SprmOperation

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.poi.hwpf.sprm.SprmOperation

@Internal
public final class SprmOperation
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to represent a sprm operation from a Word 97/2000/XP document.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ryan Ackley
